text: Tadeusz Konwicki (22 June 1926 – 7 January 2015) was a Polish screenwriter and movie director. He was a member of the Polish Language Council. He was known for his movies A Tale of Adam Mickiewicz's 'Forefathers' Eve, Kronika wypadków milosnych and Mother Joan of the Angels. Konwicki was born in present day Naujoji Vilnia, Lithuania.
